name: Oasis Bar & Terrace
location: Canada Square Park, Canary Wharf, London, E14 5AB
description: A stylish alfresco oasis in the heart of Canary Wharf, offering a rooftop terrace with panoramic views, a diverse Middle Eastern-inspired menu, handcrafted cocktails, and event hosting for up to 700 guests.

menus.food: Middle Eastern-inspired dishes including creamy hummus, smoky baba ganoush, and tender grilled skewers.
menus.drinks: Seven premium draughts, international wines, and handcrafted cocktails infused with creativity and passion.

events.name: Bottomless Brunch
events.description: Every Saturday, enjoy 90 minutes of unlimited Prosecco, Pravha beer, Mojito cocktails or Pornstar Martini, paired with a mouth-watering menu and live beats from our resident DJ.
events.time: Every Saturday, multiple start times between 12:00 and 21:00
